name: Spell or misspell
description:
This is a game I made for Bitsy Secret Santa 2019 !

It was made especially for DaneAsmund.

The prompts I got were: necromancy, demons and secret. So the first thing that came to my mind was how easy it is to misspell Santa into Satan...

Play with keyboard arrows, or swipe. Made with Bitsy and Borksy.

There is a small easter egg in Hell.
